author: Joan Druett
content:
Astrologically, it is significant. Seemingly. It does seem strange that conjunctions between these two planets can be linked to important events, but …

author: Phil
content: It will be on TV and all over the web.

author: Peter Wright
content:
Rebirth?

In Scotland the waters have already broken and it will be a long, painful and difficult labour. As with all children the awkward zero to thirty age just gives way to them being expensive.
